Text: Your Order Summary from gapcomDear Tracy Thank you for shopping gapcom Your order confirmation number is Print out this page or write this number down in case you have any questions Here is a summary of your order ORDER RECEIVED AT Shipment to Tracy Geaccone Northwestern Houston TX Description Size Color Qty Price the Big Oxford shortsleeved M white easy fit jeans adjust waist Husky antiqued easy fit khakis adjust waist Husky navy big oxford checked M orange As soon as your order is shipped pending credit authorization we will send you a separate shipment notification via email If you would like to check the current status of your order please click below aspOrderStatusLookupasp You will now receive email updates from gapcom on the latest styles sales special offers and events Please note If you have changed your email preferences to never receive emails you will not receive updates If youd rather not receive email updates from gapcom you can delete your name from our email list by clicking here mugaspetracygeacconeenroncom If you make a purchase at gapcom you will receive order and shipping confirmation emails If you have any questions please email us at or call us at GAPSTYLE Thanks again for your order gapcom Customer Service
